info.title: MobileNetworkManagementClient
info.description: The resources in this swagger specification will be used to manage mobile network resources

200.description: Delete successful.

202.description: Accepted. Sets 'Deleting' provisioningState until the operation completes. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the specified mobile network.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting mobile network resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a mobile network.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update mobile network operation.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting mobile network resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting mobile network resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update mobile network tags.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting mobile network resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the mobile networks in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of mobile network resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the mobile networks in a resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of mobile network resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Lists the IDs of all provisioned SIMs in a mobile network

200.description: List SIM IDs successful.

202.description: Accepted. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the mobile network resource.

publicLandMobileNetworkIdentifier.description: The unique public land mobile network identifier for the network. This is made up of the mobile country code and mobile network code, as defined in https://www.itu.int/rec/T-REC-E.212. The values 001-01 and 001-001 can be used for testing and the values 999-99 and 999-999 can be used on internal private networks.

value.description: A list of mobile networks in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

MobileNetworkListResult.description: Response for mobile networks API service call.

identity.description: The identity used to retrieve the encryption key from Azure key vault.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the SIM group resource.

encryptionKey.description: A key to encrypt the SIM data that belongs to this SIM group.

mobileNetwork.description: Mobile network that this SIM belongs to

keyUrl.description: The key URL, unversioned. For example: https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/azureKey.

value.description: A list of SIM groups in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SimGroupListResult.description: Response for list SIM groups API service call.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the SIM resource.

simState.description: The state of the SIM resource.

internationalMobileSubscriberIdentity.description: The international mobile subscriber identity (IMSI) for the SIM.

integratedCircuitCardIdentifier.description: The integrated circuit card ID (ICCID) for the SIM.

authenticationKey.description: The Ki value for the SIM.

operatorKeyCode.description: The Opc value for the SIM.

deviceType.description: An optional free-form text field that can be used to record the device type this SIM is associated with, for example 'Video camera'. The Azure portal allows SIMs to be grouped and filtered based on this value.

simPolicy.description: The SIM policy used by this SIM.

staticIpConfiguration.description: A list of static IP addresses assigned to this SIM. Each address is assigned at a defined network scope, made up of {attached data network, slice}.

SimStaticIpProperties.description: Static IP configuration for a SIM, scoped to a particular attached data network and slice.

attachedDataNetwork.description: The attached data network on which the static IP address will be used. The combination of attached data network and slice defines the network scope of the IP address.

slice.description: The network slice on which the static IP address will be used. The combination of attached data network and slice defines the network scope of the IP address.

staticIp.description: The static IP configuration for the SIM to use at the defined network scope.

ipv4Address.description: The IPv4 address assigned to the SIM at this network scope. This address must be in the userEquipmentStaticAddressPoolPrefix defined in the attached data network.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SimIdListResult.description: Response for list SIM IDs API service call.

value.description: A list of SIMs in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SimListResult.description: Response for list SIMs API service call.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the site resource.

networkFunctions.description: An array of IDs of the network functions deployed on the site, maintained by the user.

value.description: A list of sites in a mobile network.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SiteListResult.description: Response for sites API service call.
